channel.title: Surface Tension Crash
channel.description:
Near the end of Surface Tension the game crashes as soon as I open the door in the screenshot below.
Screenshot: [url]https://i.imgur.com/PZCHqBC.jpg[/url] Error: IVP Failed at U:\hl2_rel\src\ivp\ivp_utility\ivu_vhash.cxx 157 .mdmp: [url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/sfh19tin4da2ao7/BMS%20Dump.zip[/url]

item.title: Surface Tension Crash
item.dc:creator: RHYS4190
item.description:
punisher186:

Near the end of Surface Tension the game crashes as soon as I open the door in the screenshot below.

Screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/PZCHqBC.jpg
Error: IVP Failed at U:\hl2_rel\src\ivp\ivp_utility\ivu_vhash.cxx 157
.mdmp: https://www.dropbox.com/s/sfh19tin4da2ao7/BMS%20Dump.zip

I had the same problem with surface tension as far as im conserned get this https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-surface-tension-uncut/news/surface-tension-uncut-v20-released

this guy has redone the map so it now working perfect and is accurate to the original

Read full topic

item.title: Surface Tension Crash
item.dc:creator: punisher186
item.description:
Swaggless:

That’s the entrance to Forget About Freeman, I believe… I’m assuming it happens consistently?

Did you try directly loading the first map of FaF through the console?

changelevel bm_c3a1a Caused the same error

EDIT: Changing the level from the menu seemed to work, but there are some issues.

Screenshot: https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/630792195389402645/14414D12004E4219A024D79F20B456F3F11B7D34/

Read full topic
